review.title: “Good working environment & colleagues”
review.pros: Pros – Flexibility, great exploitation on plantation industry, willing to teach colleagues
review.cons: Cons – buildings and quarters are little run down, no public transport facility, not many food and leisure outlets
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – an appropriate sum of profit or accumulated profit should be used to maintain or upgrade facilities and amenities of the company in due course.
